metadata.title: CVE-2021-40648 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In man2html 1.6g, a filename can be created to overwrite the previous sizeparameter of the next chunk and the fd, bk, fd_nextsize, bk_nextsize of thecurrent chunk. The next chunk is then freed later on, causing a freeing ofan arbitrary amount of memory.

criterions.comment: man2html package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
